name: As a user, from different market regions, I want to be able to visit the store front and view the content available in my region

elements.name: user personalise the engaement ring and adds to shopping bag

steps.name: A user from one of the market region
I view all available Engagement Rings
I view the details of a ring
I should be be able to personalise the ring on and add it to the shopping bag "VS1" and "G" and "50"
